1595160.name: Radioactivity
1595160.description:
Radioactivity – Team up with friends as Liquidators! Avoid mutated horrors. Clean up radioactive wilderness. See it change. Survive. Have fun.

You and your team are Liquidators. You work on behalf of the public and the state, called to clean up the wasteland left by a devastating radioactive impact. Overcome radiation and the threats lurking in this dangerous world.

  • With your friends help your state to clean up the radioactive sectors of the zone

  • Procedurally generated locations promise a unique adventure with each new game entry.

  • Survival: Avoid being eaten by mutants, improve your equipment to reach more dangerous areas, and outsmart the unforgiving environment.

  • Mutants: Face unique nightmarish creatures twisted by radiation – fight for your life or become their prey.

  • World hazards: Nights are full of threats, but also valuable items. Mutants, radiation, and anomalies make every step risky.

  • Team up: Utilize proximity-based voice communication to strategize with your team in real time. Whether you're planning your next move, sharing resources, or warning of dangers, clear and direct communication is key to survival.
